### Welcome Home Live in Rancho Viejo

Rancho Viejo, Texas is a beautiful community perfectly situated between the South Texas cities of Brownsville and Harlingen. This peaceful community is built around stunning tropical waterways – or Resacas – and one of the finest golf courses in the Rio Grande Valley.

With fun family events, and plenty of outdoor activities, see why Rancho Viejo is the best place to live in the Rio Grande Valley.

[![](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Arrow-Orange.svg)](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/live-here/)

### Ample Opportunities Build in Rancho Viejo

The Rancho Viejo community is growing and right now there are ample opportunities for builders and developers to take advantage of this prime location.

Rancho Viejo offers large beautiful lots, many of which sit on the resaca, in a safe and quiet town with covenient access to the expressway and the nearby cities of Brownsville and Harlingen. First-class country club amenities available with a membership.

[![](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Arrow.svg)](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/build-here/)

![](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/build-framing.jpg)![](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/build-river.jpg)

![](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/map-ai.svg)
